name: Heads Up - Proof of Concept
description:
(Originally) made for the Reverse Jam. Now is updated whenever I have a reason to.

Basically an idea that I thought I'd see if I could pull off. You've quite literally just been born, you don't know where you are, and there seems to be something outside that can break through walls. A sniper.

If he sees you, he immediately shoots for where he thinks you are. Watch your head.

I've uploaded both a zip and a Windows Installer. Anyone who tries this out, let me know which one has better performance. Games from Game Maker sometimes seems to run slowly on other computers, and at the moment, I'm not sure why.
